imdb.plot outline: Being a cop keeps Josephine Bradley on the rails and away from her normal impulses. Freshly vulnerable after a health crisis, Jo's been handed her first big case as a Lead Detective, it's a high profile homicide wrapped in family drama and scandal.
imdb.title: Blood and Water
plot: Being a cop keeps Josephine Bradley on the rails and away from her normal impulses. Freshly vulnerable after a health crisis, Jo's been handed her first big case as a Lead Detective, it's a high profile homicide wrapped in family drama and scandal.
